description:
The course is for anyone who uses a Windows based PC -- especially business owners, freelancers, and people who work from home. Your productivity will sky-rocket, while your stress & frustration drops; and you'll save money.

You'll easily learn through a series of narrated videos with written material to support them, plus a few bonuses!

Putting the material to use is EASY and much of it can be fully automated, so you can set it and forget it!

Great effort was made to eliminate tech jargon. Anyone with just basic computer skills can do this and reap the benefits.

It is not a PC repair course or a technical course and is not for people desiring to learn about the technical side of computers.

You'll Discover:

  • How to just about guarantee that you'll never have to worry about viruses again by doing a few simple things, then automating them. You'll be amazed at the performance increase you'll get right away just by eliminating these. And your sensitive passwords, files, and data will be much safer.
  • How to automate COMPLETE backups of your system, so in the unlikely event of a total crash you can be up and running again in a couple hours (not days) like NOTHING ever happened
  • How to ensure a fire, flood, or burglary at your home or office doesn't spell the end for your business.
  • How to stop a catastrophic hard drive failure BEFORE it happens.
  • Simple things you can do to keep your computer running FAST.
  • And MUCH more
  • Did I mention much of this can be AUTOMATED and there is no theory or tech jargon (because this is EASY) to confuse you?
title: The Lazy Man's Guide to Automated Computer Care
